synopsis.text: Godai Shun, a young soccer enthusiast, finds himself at a crossroads in life. Born into a family of affluent businessmen, his grandfather has grand plans for him to follow in his footsteps and become a high-ranking CEO. However, Shun's heart lies elsewhere - on the soccer field. Torn between the pressure to fulfill his grandfather's expectations and his own dreams of becoming a professional soccer player, Shun's life takes an unexpected turn when a casual soccer game at the Godai Resort with his friend Roberto catches the attention of a young soccer team. As opportunities unfold, Shun must decide whether to chase his dreams or comply with his grandfather's wishes.
synopsis.author: mistral.mistral-large-2402-v1:0
